about_the_game:
Take the helm of an ambulance, prepare for emergency situations, and transport the injured to the hospital, navigating through obstacles and creating the quickest routes. Utilize cutting-edge navigation systems and radio communication to stay in constant contact with the central command and coordinate your actions in real-time. Ambulance Simulator 911 offers a chance to feel the gravity and responsibility of a paramedic's profession, providing you with the tools and equipment to save lives in the most extreme situations.

Realistic Medical Equipment: A wide array of medical instruments and equipment awaits you, which you'll use to save lives. Manage the ambulance and employ modern medical devices.

Medical Career: Embark on a journey from a rookie to an experienced rescuer, tackling challenging missions and learning how to respond to emergencies. Earn reputation and unlock access to new tools and tasks.

Action and Realism: Ambulance Simulator 911 presents players with a unique opportunity to immerse themselves in the daily life of an emergency medical worker, where they can experience realistic situations and the significance of quick responses to critical events.

Diverse Missions: Confront various emergency calls, from road accidents to workplace incidents. Your mission is to provide initial medical assistance and safely transport the injured to the hospital as swiftly as possible.

name: Ambulance Simulator 911 Emergency

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Ambulance Simulator is an exhilarating simulation that allows you to become a real-life rescuer and a member of the emergency medical service team. In this game, you'll experience the responsibility and adrenaline associated with working on the frontlines of emergency medical assistance.
